scripts.copy:developpment: cp -r src/ dist.developpment && rm dist.developpment/*.ts && rm dist.developpment/**/*.ts
scripts.copy:production: cp -r src/ dist.production && rm dist.production/*.ts && rm dist.production/**/*.ts
scripts.transpile-all:developpment: npm run empty:developpment && npm run copy:developpment && npm run transpile-ts:developpment
scripts.transpile-all:production: npm run empty:production && npm run copy:production && npm run transpile-ts:production
scripts.dev: npx concurrently 'npm run transpile-all:developpment' 'npm run serve:developpment'
scripts.dev:watch: npx concurrently 'npm run transpile-all:developpment:watch' 'npm run serve:developpment:watch'
scripts.prod: npx concurrently 'npm run transpile-all:production' 'npm run serve:production'
